infotexts.missiondescription.cargoMagicItems: The alchemy lab has commissioned a shipment of magical materials, but they don’t seem very concerned, as if something else is more important.
infotexts.missionmessage.cargoMagicItems: The alchemy lab thanks you for your effort.
infotexts.missiondescription.Cargo_Touhou_Food_Ing: The outpost’s transport department requests delivery of these ingredients to food-short stations to provide much-needed aid.
infotexts.missionmessage.Cargo_Touhou_Food_Ingredi: The residents thank you for your help.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Cargo_New_Year: This is a shipment of New Year gifts to another location. The sender promises to send you a gift afterward as well.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Cargo_New_Year_Gif: The gifts will be delivered to your submarine.
infotexts.missiondescription.killMaoyu: Furballs roam the sea. Though harmless, the dense sonar blips make hearts race—until you realize it’s just furballs.
infotexts.missionmessage.killMaoyu: This sea area is quiet for now.
infotexts.missiondescription.killghost: Some urban legend seems to have spawned dangerous ghosts along this route. They appear harmless but cause serious trouble. Exercise caution!
infotexts.missionsuccess.Tohou_Ghost_Line: The ghosts vanished from the route.
infotexts.missionmessage.Tohou_Ghost_Line: May the lingering souls roam the night sky, lighting your way.
infotexts.missiondescription.killphotosphere: Strange entities roam this route. Witnesses say at first glance they are not native lifeforms. Investigate the cause.
infotexts.missionmessage.killphotosphere: Confirmed: these are not lifeforms of this planet. Perhaps someone can reveal their true nature.
infotexts.missiondescription.killgreenufo: There are no UFOs on Europa. Find out what’s really happening.
infotexts.missionmessage.killgreenufo: The so-called UFO seems only a disguise of some entity; the disturbance is temporarily settled.
infotexts.missiondescription.killredufo: There are no UFOs on Europa. Investigate the truth.
infotexts.missionmessage.killredufo: These red UFOs seem overexcited; perhaps the color is significant.
infotexts.missionsuccess.killredufo: The next mission will be even more dangerous.
infotexts.missiondescription.killblueufo: There are no UFOs on Europa. Investigate the truth.
infotexts.missionmessage.killblueufo: At last the dangerous blue UFOs are gone. Perhaps someone at Myouren Temple knows their origin.
infotexts.missionsuccess.killblueufo: The mastermind should reveal itself soon.
infotexts.missionmessage.FindHoujuuNue: “Do you know the distance between Earth and the Moon is 380,000 km?” “Once, humans launched a satellite called ‘Bird Ship.’ If still operating, it would also be 380,000 km from Earth.” “It carried plants, animals, and an optimized ecosystem to test adaptation in space—an experiment for future terraforming.” “After an unexplained malfunction it became space debris, remaining forever at the Trojan point forming an equilateral triangle with Earth and Moon.” “People spent fortunes, only to create an isolated relic. Later it was called the ‘Bird Ship Ruins.’” “It’s said the life inside never died, but formed another strange world.”
infotexts.missionsuccess.FindHoujuuNue: Several research stations based on the Bird Ship Ruins exist on Europa, but all are now abandoned.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A group seeking a new form of life succumbed to temptation, becoming half-human, half-demon. For the justice and peace of Gensokyo, someone has hired you to eliminate them and detonate the reactor to cleanse this unholy site.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Humans turning into youkai is a grave sin—let Lady Shiki teach them a lesson.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Those who sought to become youkai should never have lived.
infotexts.missiondescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pe: Many report strange flashes in nearby ruins. Investigate their origin.
infotexts.missionmessage.Salvage_Mysterious_Pearl_: The anomaly turned out to be a Spirit Pearl. Report your findings to Akyuu.
infotexts.missiondescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pe: Miners spotted unusual flashes deep in the cave. Investigate the cause.
infotexts.missiondescription.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Cra: Corrupted Crawlers hide in a cave. Eliminate them and their nest to stop the spread of pollution.
infotexts.missionmessage.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Crawler: A potential mutation has been successfully cut off.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A fully demonized group occupies this site. Eliminate them, set an example, and detonate the reactor to cleanse the area.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Humans turning into youkai is a grave sin—let Lady Shiki teach them a lesson.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: How many people were devoured to become like this?
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: The alchemy lab lost important materials here and offers a hefty reward for their recovery.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: We arrived too late; the resources have turned to worthless scrap. Hopefully the lab will accept this outcome.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Better late than never—though it’s already too late.
infotexts.missiondescription.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Mud: A dangerous group of cursed Mudraptor remnants has fled into a cave. A generous bounty is offered to eliminate them.
infotexts.missionmessage.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Mudrapt: Another group of aura-polluted creatures—where does the corruption originate?
infotexts.missiondescription.Clear_Reiki_Deteriora: After a cargo ship disappeared, many aura-polluted Tiger Threshers appeared in nearby caves. Multiple factions offer rich rewards to eradicate them.
infotexts.missionmessage.Clear_Reiki_Deterioration: The pollution on these creatures is growing worse—perhaps the source is close.
infotexts.missiondescription.Kill_Reiki_Deteriorat: Investigations point to a region likely hosting the pollution source. Hunt and cleanse the corrupted creatures for a high bounty.
infotexts.missionmessage.Kill_Reiki_Deterioration_: Follow this route further to find the true source of the corruption.
infotexts.missionmessage.FindClownpiece: The 20th-century Noah’s Ark soared skyward with hope and anxiety. Now, in the so-called future of the 24th century, shed the mask of fantasy—what lonely face lies beneath? Perhaps the Bird Ship Ruins hold the answers you seek.
infotexts.missionsuccess.FindClownpiece: From Earth we came, drifting like the abandoned Bird Ship Ruins into the unknown.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A band of raiders occupies an abandoned station. The alchemy lab requests that you eliminate them so they can take over the site.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: No matter what special goods lie inside, it’s best not to meddle.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: For such people, mercilessness is the best gift.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: Strange black mist permeates this area, identical to the conditions at recent aura-pollution sites. The Alliance Alchemy Lab offers a hefty reward to investigate.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Can these… still be called human?
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The aura-polluted monsters emerged from here—truth or deception behind it remains unknown.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A failed experiment by renegade alchemists filled this station with toxic fog. The tainted magic corrodes bone on inhalation and renders ranged weapons inaccurate. Melee combat is the only way to survive—eliminate this danger quickly.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss:
A lost log reads: 
Cleanse cleanse cleanse cleanse evolve evolve evolve evolve evolve
I can’t understand, I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I can’t understand!
I… Your blade is swifter than the spreading toxin. Hold your breath, grip the edge—beyond lies the next station shrouded in endless black mist.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: What illusion drove everyone here to madness?
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A failed alchemist left behind pollution that infected cultured Algae Crawlers and other creatures. The station is now abandoned. Purge it to protect nearby residents.
A band of fleeing thieves vanished here without a trace. Investigate what happened and watch for hidden dangers. If things go wrong, destroy the reactor and evacuate immediately.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: How many such hidden threats remain?
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: The Alliance and separatist submarines both vanished inside an old abandoned facility rumored to be a fallen Earth space station. All investigators sent by either side never returned. It has become a feared forbidden zone.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The result is obvious: at some point a secret society of renegade magicians formed on Europa.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Choices were never really yours to make.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: Surviving renegade magicians hide here, ready to die with their enemies. Be cautious. As support, the alchemy lab has placed special magic at the station—use explosives to wipe them out in one strike.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The rebels are eliminated—is it truly safe now?
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The inner urge for destruction subsides—what illusion caused the strange weather just now?
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: The last remnants of renegade magicians have gathered here, their secrets still unknown.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The nameless king mastered the art of the unseen; the ending was inevitable.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The outcome—good or bad—lies with the one who decides.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Special_Materi: The scanner has given a direction—Nitori’s needed special material seems nearby.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Special_Material_S: All materials must be brought back safely.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Boss_M: After the small ghosts were cleared, a massive, untrackable photosphere appeared, drifting between sea regions. The station administrator offers a large reward to investigate the truth.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Boss_Missi: The spectral creature seems to be guarding something.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Spectr: After the appearance of small ghosts, similar ghostly creatures—Spectral Sharks—began harassing submarines. Eliminating them yields a rich bounty, but many are more curious about the cause.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Spectral_M: These spectral creatures are more than simple ghosts; study their ectoplasm for clues.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Spectr: Ghostly beings—Spectral Sharks and Spectral Crawlers—now trouble passing submarines. Eliminating them yields bounty, but the cause remains of great interest.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Spectral_M: The spectral creatures grow more frenzied, seemingly linked to recent cleanup operations.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Spectr: The appearance of spectral creatures seems tied to a past alchemy experiment. Now even more dangerous Spectral Whales have emerged, causing major damage. The lab remains silent—surely hiding something. First, protect nearby residents.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Spectral_M: The spectral creatures have grown more violent—likely related to recent cleanup operations.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Spectr: After clearing Spectral Sharks, Crawlers, and Whales, an even more dangerous entity appeared. Standard sonar can’t detect it—only visual confirmation shows a high-speed creature. Eliminate it quickly to secure the sea.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Spectral_M: The sea is calm for now, but faint magical pulses emanate from distant caves.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_Spectr: For the first time, spectral creatures were found in caves rather than routes. This mission is classified; only a select few know of it.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_Monster_Spectral_M: The source turned out to be a Spirit Pearl.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_Monster_UFO_Cl: Scattered UFOs are harassing nearby outposts. Someone has hired you to eliminate them.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: Since the Bird Vessel Ruins were taken over by the Joint Investigation Team of the Europa Alliance, the surrounding waters have only grown more polluted. Civilian teams that ventured there on their own have mysteriously vanished. Are you ready to uncover the truth?
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The so-called investigation team was nothing but a façade.
infotexts.missionsuccess.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: The remaining research data here proves that the Europa Alliance has been secretly developing a biological weapon—or perhaps something even worse.
